issue.title: [CI] GitHub Actions should trigger on changes to GitHub Actions configuration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7328](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7328). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, when you only change something in the `.github/workflows` directory, most GitHub Actions don't get run.
